body: This is going to make frontpage of The Sun when the coppers finally raid my hard disk.
Damn, I've seen some shit in my life too, but eyeball socket and ear stuff ain't for me. Shame, you had me enthralled up until then.
Damn. I've seen some shit in my life, but I can't fap to this. I just end up feeling sorry for her, especially on page 23.
